name: OR_LOG_PNDS_OUT
description: The OR_LOG_PNDS_OUT table contains OR management system log PNDS outcome information.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log that the PNDS outcomes refer to.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the PNDS outcome in the log.

columns.name: PNDS_OUTCOME_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the PNDS outcome.

columns.name: PNDS_OUTCOME_ID_ELEMENT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the PNDS record.

columns.name: PNDS_OUT_ACHVD_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag indicating whether or not this outcome was achieved.

columns.name: PNDS_OUT_NOTES
columns.description: Free text comments about the outcome.

columns.name: PNDS_OUT_ADDED_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag indicating whether or not this outcome was added by a user.
